targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year,'-',Month,'-',1,' 00:00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %T')) as time,
  AVG(Count*ActiveDuration)/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year,'-',Month,'-',1,' 00:00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %T')))*86400) as value,
  FQAN as metric
FROM VAcceleratorSummaries
WHERE 
  FQAN IN ($Activity) AND
  SiteName IN ($Site) AND
  Type IN ($Type) AND
  Category in ($Category)
GROUP BY time, metric
HAVING $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

IF '${LineSeries}' = "Allocation" THEN
SELECT
  $__timeFrom() as "time",
  ifnull((SELECT
   SUM(Allocation)
   FROM Allocations
   WHERE Date <= $__timeFrom() AND Activity in ($VO)
   GROUP BY Date
   ORDER BY Date desc
   LIMIT 1),0) as "Allocation"
UNION
SELECT
  Date as "time",
  SUM(Allocation) as "Allocation"
FROM Allocations
WHERE $__timeFilter(Date) AND Activity in ($VO)
GROUP BY Date
UNION 
SELECT 
  $__timeTo(),
  (SELECT SUM(Allocation) as "Allocation"
   FROM Allocations
   WHERE Date <= $__timeTo() and Activity in ($VO)
   GROUP BY Date
   ORDER BY Date desc
   LIMIT 1);
END IF;

panels.title: Average Individual Accelerator Usage by Activity and Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year,'-',Month,'-',1,' 00:00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %T')) as time,
  SUM(Count)/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year,'-',Month,'-',1,' 00:00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %T')))) as value,
  Model as metric
FROM VAcceleratorSummaries
WHERE 
  FQAN IN ($Activity) AND
  SiteName IN ($Site) AND
  Type IN ($Type) AND
  Category in ($Category)
GROUP BY time, metric
HAVING $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

IF '${LineSeries}' = "Allocation" THEN
SELECT
  $__timeFrom() as "time",
  ifnull((SELECT
   SUM(Allocation)
   FROM Allocations
   WHERE Date <= $__timeFrom() AND Activity in ($VO)
   GROUP BY Date
   ORDER BY Date desc
   LIMIT 1),0) as "Allocation"
UNION
SELECT
  Date as "time",
  SUM(Allocation) as "Allocation"
FROM Allocations
WHERE $__timeFilter(Date) AND Activity in ($VO)
GROUP BY Date
UNION 
SELECT 
  $__timeTo(),
  (SELECT SUM(Allocation) as "Allocation"
   FROM Allocations
   WHERE Date <= $__timeTo() and Activity in ($VO)
   GROUP BY Date
   ORDER BY Date desc
   LIMIT 1);
END IF;

SELECT 
  TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year,'-',Month,'-',1,' 00:00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %T')) as time,
  AVG(Cores*Count*AvailableDuration)/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year,'-',Month,'-',1,' 00:00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %T')))*86400) as value,
  Model as metric
FROM VAcceleratorSummaries
WHERE 
  FQAN IN ($Activity) AND
  SiteName IN ($Site) AND
  Type IN ($Type) AND
  Category IN ($Category)
GROUP BY time, metric
HAVING $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year,'-',Month,'-',1,' 00:00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %T')) as time,
  AVG(Cores*Count*AvailableDuration)/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year,'-',Month,'-',1,' 00:00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %T')))*86400) as value,
  Type as metric
FROM VAcceleratorSummaries
WHERE 
  FQAN IN ($Activity) AND
  SiteName IN ($Site) AND
  Type IN ($Type)
GROUP BY time, metric
HAVING $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year,'-',Month,'-',1,' 00:00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %T')) as Time,
  CONCAT(Year,'-',Month) as Month,
  Type,
  Model,
  FQAN,
  Count as "Number of Cards",
  AvailableDuration/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year,'-',Month,'-',1,' 00:00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %T')))*3600) as "Total GPU Hours",
  ActiveDuration/(DAYOFMONTH(LAST_DAY(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(Year,'-',Month,'-',1,' 00:00:00'),'%Y-%m-%d %T')))*3600) as "Active GPU Hours",
  SiteName as "Site Name",
  Category
FROM VAcceleratorSummaries
WHERE 
  FQAN IN ($Activity) AND
  SiteName IN ($Site) AND
  Type IN ($Type) AND
  Category in ($Category)
GROUP BY Time
HAVING $__timeFilter(Time)
ORDER BY Time

list.name: Type

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT Category FROM VAcceleratorSummaries WHERE Category IS NOT NULL;
list.name: Category
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT Category FROM VAcceleratorSummaries WHERE Category IS NOT NULL;
